Package romanemperorsscraper.ui.tree

Class DynastyTreeFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • romanemperorsscraper.ui.tree.DynastyTreeFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class DynastyTreeFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class used to create, represent and show a frame containing the genealogical tree graph of a specific Dynasty (the one the DynastyTree of the DynastyTreeFrame itself is related to)
    Author:
    Matteo Collica, Sara Lazzaroni
    See Also:
    DynastyTree, Dynasty, Serialized Form
